an6.82:1.1: “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an6.82:1.3: Panatipati hoti, adinnadayi hoti, kamesumicchacari hoti, musavadi hoti, luddho ca, pagabbho ca.
an6.82:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an6.82:2.1: Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge.
an6.82:2.3: Panatipata pativirato hoti, adinnadana pativirato hoti, kamesumicchacara pativirato hoti, musavada pativirato hoti, aluddho ca, appagabbho ca.
an6.82:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge”ti.
